alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:19PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Victoria and northeastern Goliad Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1019 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Goliad, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Fannin, Schroeder, Coleto Creek Park, Ander, Oak Village and Weser. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 628 and 642. US Highway 59 between mile markers 648 and 668. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
